errors.permission.nopermission: You don't have permission to run this command!
warnings.big_number: Warning: The number you entered is above the recommended limit and might act oddly.
errors.player_required: Error: You must be a player to run this command.
errors.number_required: Error: A number is required to run this subcommand.
errors.number_less_than_zero: Error: The number entered was less than 0. Please enter a number greater than 0.
errors.not_a_number: Error: The data entered is not a number. Please enter a number.
errors.invalid_item_held: The item that is being held is invalid. Please hold a valid item.
